concept.title: August 24, 2017
concept.shortdesc: Release Notes for the August 24, 2017 release.

row.entry: Added SAFE Image Classification Tags to content in App Content and ModQ.
Fixed a bug in Comments to enable .mov or .mpg to be uploaded successfully.
Fixed a bug which hid recent items from showing up in the Activity History tab.
Fixed a bug to allow bulk trashing comments.
Fixed a bug with no results being returned when using Tag and Rating search in Library.

Overhauled the Rights modal for the Library and Social Search pages. Added the ability to manually grant and revoke rights on assets. Error/warning messages are more clear, and help guide you to sending valid rights requests and replies. An improved activity history is now displayed in the modal.
Fixed a bug which hid recent items from showing up in the Activity History tab.
Added clearer error messages when creating new Sites.
Fixed a sort order bug with the Recent and Oldest filters in App Manager.
Fixed a bug which hid other connected networks from displaying in the Network Profile Switcher.
Fixed a bug that prevented rights status updates from displaying immediately without a page refresh.
Fixed a bug to enable sorting by "most participants" and by "most items."
Fixed a bug that caused app timestamps to show an incorrect creation date in the table.
Fixed a bug which prevented newly invited user managers from being able to perform certain admin actions, such as tagging users.
